name: Idle Percent
description:
Idle Percent is something fresh in games of this genre. Unusual mathematics with various features and possibilities make this game worth trying!

Every upgrade in this game is a percent which is added to the upgradable value. Your progression is slow at the beginning but with time your income will become higher and higher!

Buy upgrades, discover complex prestige system and use other features to maximize your income. And unlike other idle games, you can complete this one!

GAMEPLAY

Click or wait for idle income. Upgrade your interest income or maximize click profit. Play as you want!

PERCENTAGE PROGRESSION

Unique mathematics based on percentages with a smooth increase in prices and income.

UPGRADES AND PRESTIGE

Buy base upgrades to increase your stats and income. Use prestige system to reset your progress and get powerful permanent improvements.

SUPER PRESTIGE

Even prestige upgrades can be improved! Buy super upgrades to maximize prestige power.

GRAPHICS

Nice minimalistic graphics and clean UI so nothing distracts you. You can even select your own background!

MUSIC

Dozens of calm ambient music tracks for your joy.

ACHIEVEMENTS

55 Steam achievements are waiting for you! Will you be able to collect them all?

Idle Percent is not as simple as is looks. Try something really unusual and get guaranteed pleasure!
